alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:44PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Pringle, or 12 miles south of Custer, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pringle and Argyle around 850 PM MDT. Southwestern Wind Cave National Park around 855 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hot Springs, Cold Brook Reservoir, Buffalo Gap and Maverick Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
